query.name: com.hanovertwpschools.core.clever.teachers
query.sql: WITH My_Schools AS ( SELECT school_number FROM SCHOOLS WHERE SCHOOL_NUMBER < 100 UNION SELECT 0 FROM DUAL ) SELECT CASE coalesce(users.homeschoolid,0) WHEN 0 THEN 'DEFAULT_DISTRICT_OFFICE' ELSE to_char(coalesce(My_SCHOOLS.school_number,users.homeschoolid)) END "school_id", users.dcid "teacher_id", users.teachernumber "teacher_number", s_nj_usr_x.StaffMemberID "State_Teacher_id", users.email_addr "teacher_email", users.first_name "first_name", users.middle_name "middle_name", users.last_name "last_name", '' department, users.title title, users.email_addr username, '' password, groups.name "ext.group_name" FROM users LEFT JOIN s_NJ_usr_x ON s_NJ_usr_x.usersdcid = users.dcid LEFT JOIN gen groups ON groups.cat = 'groups' AND groups.id = users.groupvalue LEFT JOIN u_def_ext_users ON u_def_ext_users.usersdcid = users.dcid LEFT JOIN My_Schools ON users.homeschoolid= My_Schools.school_number WHERE users.ptaccess = 1 AND users.dcid IN ( SELECT schoolstaff.users_dcid FROM schoolstaff WHERE schoolstaff.status = 1 ) AND ( u_def_ext_users.clever_exclude IS NULL OR u_def_ext_users.clever_exclude = 0 ) ORDER BY users.dcid
